page.title: 19Tide of Change
page.content:
Many changes have taken place since {Stockbridge Village Trust}took over the part of{ Cantril Farm}which falls within the Urban District of Knowsley. New roads have been built, porches and garden walls added to houses. People can rent or buy the new garages. A great improvement on the 'old' estate, vandalised in just 15 years. Over the boundary a similar 'Urban Regeneration' scheme to demolish or convert maisonettes and build anew is progressing. Will it be the rock on which the finances of{Liverpool City {Council}founders ? History is in the making as this data is being recorded. Nestling between the two is the { {'Brookside'}estate, where the Channel Four 'Soap Opera' is recorded.
Carol Dunn Kim Parkinson 9 Trees(Knowsley) Mab Lane(Liverpool)
